pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference on Average Treatment Effects for Continuous Treatments // Conduct inference on the sample average treatment effect for a matched (observational) dataset with a continuous treatment. Equipped with calipered non-bipartite matching, bias-corrected sample average treatment effect estimation, and covariate- adjusted variance estimation. Matching, estimation, and inference methods are described in Frazier, Heng and Zhou (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2409.11701.
